Star Wars for Teaching from David Smeltzer on Vimeo.

item.title: Google Teacher Academy for Administrators Video
item.description: I've applied to attend the Google Teacher Academy for Administrators, and as part of the submission process I was required to complete a video entitled "Innovative Leadership in the Age of Google". I decided to list what words inspire me as an educational leader and arrange them with pictures and â€¦
